attributes.action: Deal with vehicle crime & the associated effects it has on victims
attributes.additional_details: This country is being blighted with the average working person having their lives turned upside down.  Both emotionally & financially
attributes.background: I want a minimum 10 year sentence. No time off for good behaviour.  10 means 10

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure what you'd like covered by "vehicle crime" 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
